Best of 2013 Conferences

04 November 2013 | Comments

#

Issues

*Charging me for my hotel room by accident. There's a reason I can't go to conferences that don't pay for my hotel room: I can't afford it. So when I end up with hundreds of dollars of charges on my card for a room that was supposed to be covered ("We just need your card for confirmation, ma'am."), it creates no end of consternation for me. In the middle of the conference, I'll have to bother the organizers about it when I should be prepping my talk. And it creates a whole new invoicing task for me when I get home. In short: charging me for a comped room causes me pain. Do whatever it takes to make sure it never happens, and if it does, get that reimbursement check in the mail as soon as you get off the plane.

*_
